PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-07672013-06-06,  ,  PS,  , 
ActRoyal Canadian Mounted Police Act
PrecisReappointment of IAN D.C. MCPHAIL, Q.C., of Toronto, Ontario, as part-time Vice-Chairman of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police Public Complaints Commission, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of six months or on the day prior to the establishment of the new Civilian Review and Complaints Commission for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police, whichever is earlier, effective July 14, 2013.
AttachmentsAttachment
